sentences.en: a savoury smell from the kitchen
A succulent and complex Pinot Noir showing smouldering savoury and gamey character.
sentences.cn: 这是一款极其鲜美而复杂的黑比诺,风味独特.

sentences.en: A succulent and complex Pinot smouldering savoury and gamey character.
sentences.cn: 这是一款极其鲜美而复杂的黑皮诺,风味独特.

sentences.en: All this will mean supping with less - than - savoury figures.
sentences.cn: 这一切意味着要亲近那些不太让人愉快的人物.

sentences.en: Because it has strong flavour, very savoury, fatty, yummy but not greasy.
sentences.cn: 由于他味道很重很咸, 很肥很好吃但不油腻.

sentences.en: Do you prefer sweet or savoury food?
He ate every savoury morsel of a delectable stew at the dinner.
sentences.cn: 晚餐时他吃遍每一道味美可口的炖食.

sentences.en: I gather his past life was not altogether savoury.
sentences.cn: 我猜想他过去的生活并非十分正派.

sentences.en: Italian cooking is best known for savoury dishes.
sentences.cn: 意大利菜以辛辣菜系最为出名。

sentences.en: Quite clearly one of our favourite of the First Growths this year, it has a lovely, savoury minerality that gives it elegance, despite its power.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问是今年的头等酒中我们最喜欢的之一，她有迷人、开胃的矿物质味，这使得酒尽管富有力量但不失优雅。

sentences.en: Savoury dishes are also cooked by this sections.
sentences.cn: 开胃才也由这个部门负责.

sentences.en: Small savoury biscuits provide a simple appetizer.
sentences.cn: 可口的小饼乾就是简单的开胃品.

sentences.en: Still the new public wanted something more savoury than its elegant teachers had given.
sentences.cn: 新的公众需要比文绉绉的夫子所提供的更有味道的作品.

sentences.en: The savoury smell greeted them as they went through the door.
sentences.cn: 他们进门时一阵香味扑鼻而来。

sentences.en: This place doesn't have a very savoury reputation.
sentences.cn: 这个地方的名声可不太好.

sentences.en: We often follow the savoury course with a sweet course.
sentences.cn: 我们常常吃了开胃的菜,接着就吃甜的菜.

words.tran_cn: 可口的；风味极佳的；味美的
可口的；开胃的；令人愉快的

trans.tran_cn: 可口的，咸味的，辣味的，令人愉快的
trans.tran_en: a savoury smell or taste is strong and pleasant but is not sweet
